mapper.select: SELECT id, equipment FROM equipment WHERE equipment = #{equipment}

SELECT e.id, e.equipment, e.rare, e.rank, e.type, e.item, e.own, e.own "left", c."order", c.material, c.num FROM equipment e LEFT JOIN compose c ON e.equipment = c.equipment ORDER BY e.rare, e.rank, e.type, e.item, e.id
